title: Need for Speed Collection 1-6 (PC)
description:
Original Need for Speed CD-ROMS in format MDS/MDF.


This torrent contains : 


Need for Speed (1995)

Need for Speed Second Edition (1996) 

Need for Speed 2 (1997)

Need for Speed 2 Second Edition (1997)

Need for Speed 3 - Hot Pursuit (1998)

Need for Speed 4 - High Stakes (1999)

Need for Speed 5 - Porsche Unleashed (2000)

Need for Speed 6 - Hot Pursuit 2 (2002)

instructions: unrar .rar files, mount mds file using alcohol 120 or daemon tools, install, play.

Important: 1) All files are compressed with rar 5 format file. only winrar 5 can unzip such files.

2) Need for Speed 4, 5 and 6 are copy protected by safedisc. These files will not work if copied to a CDROM in a wrong way.

3) These CDROMS are perfect 1:1 copies of the original CDROM, thus doesnt require any crack to work properly, but if you wish to play without load the image file in a virtual CDROM drive, feel free in the web to search a NOCD crack.


Good luck!
